title: Emerald and Diamond Gold Chain - Modern Makara Kanti
materials: Diamonds (0.57 ct total). Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: A sleek and modern chain necklace featuring a central pendant with two pear-shaped emeralds elegantly framing a cascade of brilliant-cut diamonds. The pendant's design offers a contemporary twist on traditional South Indian jewelry, perfect for everyday wear or special occasions.
colors: Vibrant green of the emeralds contrasted against the dazzling white of the diamonds and the warm yellow of the 22K gold.
occasions: or as a sophisticated touch to evening attire. Can be a thoughtful gift for birthdays
description: This exquisite piece combines the timeless appeal of gold and gemstones with a modern design sensibility. The high-quality materials and Hyderabadi polish ensure lasting beauty and durability. The emeralds, known for their association with prosperity and good fortune, make this a truly special and meaningful piece.
